translations.settings.back.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.settings.title: Settings
translations.settings.general.title: General
translations.settings.language.label: Language
translations.settings.max-relays.title: Max relays per user
translations.settings.max-relays.description: Number of relays to use per user
translations.settings.client-tags.title: Client Tags
translations.settings.client-tags.add.description: Add the Nostria client tag to events you publish
translations.settings.client-tags.show.description: Show what client that authors are using
translations.settings.media.title: Media
translations.settings.media.description: Control how media content is displayed based on your following status
translations.settings.media.show-always.description: All media content will be displayed immediately without blurring.
translations.settings.media.blur-non-following.descri: Media from accounts you don't follow will be blurred. Click to reveal.
translations.settings.media.blur-always.description: All media will be blurred by default. Click to reveal individual items.
translations.settings.navigation.title: Navigation
translations.settings.navigation.start-last-page.desc: When opening the app, restore the last page you were viewing.
translations.settings.navigation.start-feeds-last-eve: Show previously loaded events first when opening feeds, with new posts appearing via a button. Prevents the feed from jumping to the latest events on reload.
translations.settings.release-channel.description: Get early access to new features (Premium)
translations.settings.logging.debug.description: Shows all log messages including detailed debug information.
translations.settings.logging.info.description: Shows informational messages, warnings and errors.
translations.settings.danger-zone.title: Danger Zone
translations.settings.danger-zone.reset-notifications: This will delete all cached notifications from local storage. Your notifications will be refetched from relays.
translations.settings.danger-zone.wipe-data.descripti: This will delete all your local app data and reload the application.
translations.settings.algorithm.title: Algorithm Settings
translations.settings.algorithm.subtitle: Manage your content recommendation algorithm and user engagement metrics
translations.settings.algorithm.privacy.description: All these metrics are locally on your device and not shared with anyone.
translations.settings.algorithm.stats.title: Algorithm Statistics
translations.settings.algorithm.stats.subtitle: Overview of your engagement metrics
translations.settings.algorithm.metrics.title: User Metrics
translations.settings.algorithm.metrics.subtitle: View and manage user engagement data
translations.settings.relays.title: Manage Relays
translations.settings.relays.no-relays.title: No Account Relays Configured
translations.settings.relays.no-relays.description: You don't have any relays configured yet. Relays are essential for using Nostr.
translations.settings.relays.manual-add: Or manually add a relay using the input below
translations.settings.relays.malformed.title: Malformed Relay Configuration Detected
translations.settings.relays.malformed.description: Your relay list (kind 10002) was created by another Nostr client with incorrect tag names. The event uses 'relay' tags instead of the correct 'r' tags according to the Nostr protocol.
translations.settings.relays.malformed.action: This may prevent some Nostr clients from properly loading your relays. Click the button below to automatically repair and republish your relay list with the correct format.
translations.settings.relays.dm-relays.title: Direct Message relays
translations.settings.relays.dm-relays.description: Nostria advices Nostr users to not use different relays for Direct Messages. If you want this advanced feature, you can use a different Nostr client that supports it.
translations.settings.relays.deprecated.title: Deprecated Warning
translations.settings.relays.deprecated.description: Your following list contains a list of relays. This is deprecated in the protocol.
translations.settings.privacy.title: Privacy and Safety Settings
translations.settings.privacy.url.title: URL Privacy
translations.settings.privacy.url.remove-tracking: Remove tracking parameters from pasted URLs
translations.settings.privacy.image-cache.title: Image Cache Service
translations.settings.privacy.social-sharing.title: Social Sharing Options
translations.settings.privacy.reported.title: Reported Content Settings
translations.settings.privacy.reported.description: Choose which types of reported content to automatically hide. When content is hidden, you can still choose to reveal it.
translations.settings.privacy.blocked.title: Blocked Accounts
translations.settings.trust.title: Trust
translations.settings.trust.description: Enable Web of Trust features using NIP-85 trusted assertions. This allows you to view reputation metrics and user statistics calculated by trusted service providers.
translations.settings.trust.relay.title: Trust Relay
translations.settings.trust.relay.description: Select which relay to use for fetching NIP-85 trusted assertions (kind 30382 events). These relays provide calculated metrics like follower counts, user ranks, and activity statistics.
translations.settings.trust.relay.label: Trust Relay
translations.settings.trust.about.title: About NIP-85 Trusted Assertions
translations.settings.trust.about.description: NIP-85 allows service providers to calculate and publish metrics about users and events that would be too resource-intensive to compute on clients. These include follower counts, user ranks, post counts, zap amounts, and more. The relay setting is stored locally and is not synced across devices.
translations.settings.logs.title: Logs and debugging
translations.settings.logs.relay-stats.title: Relay Statistics
translations.settings.about.title: About Nostria
translations.settings.about.description: Nostria puts control back where it belongs: with you. Build your social network the way you want, keep your profile and data under your control, and share and explore a decentralized space that resists censorship while being quick to join and friendly to use. Your Social Network.
translations.settings.about.what-is.title: What is Nostria?
translations.settings.about.what-is.p1: Nostria is a client for the Nostr protocol, which is a decentralized social network protocol. It allows users to communicate and share information without relying on a central server.
translations.settings.about.what-is.p2: Nostria implements the usage of the Nostr protocol to ensure maximum decentralization and global scalability, without compromising on user experience. The client is designed to be fast, responsive, and easy to use, with a focus on providing a great user experience.
translations.settings.about.desktop.description: Nostria is also accessible as desktop app:
translations.settings.about.more-info.description: Visit our website for more information, documentation, and support.
translations.settings.about.credits.title: Credits & Acknowledgments
translations.settings.about.credits.description: We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to our investors who have made Nostria possible:
translations.settings.about.credits.thanks: Thank you for believing in our vision of making the Nostr protocol accessible to everyone and supporting the development of a truly decentralized social network.
